[b][color=white]Stop the Thread Editing Abuse![/color][/b] 
Due to members junking old, unwanted threads, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] removed the Junk feature a while back. With that being said, this left members unable to junk the threads that they possibly made when they first joined the website and are now embarrassing to look at. Everyone has those types of threads so do not try and hide that. With that being said, members have found a way to get around this Junk feature removal by just simply editing their threads. Members are editing them by changing the title to, "closed" or "junk" and removing the body (content) of the thread and replacing it with "Please junk this thread", "Please ignore this" and so much more. There is no way Omni would remove the editing feature because everyone needs to use it; everyone makes mistakes, however, members are getting banned for doing this. The staff team is doing a good job on cracking down those who are abusing the editing feature and are banning members for months. Heck, you may even get hit by a closed account by Omni who has been closing members for doing this. If you do not want to take this seriously, then take a look at the bans page if you are an Ub3r member. Be warned, Hack Forums.

[b][color=white]No More Discussions in Weekly Reports[/color][/b] 
iHydra has changed the rule that allowed members to participate in discussions in the [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5698512]Weekly Reports[/url] thread. In the past, members were allowed to give their opinions and feedbacks on things reported. Times have changed because now iHydra is requiring members to stop doing that and ask that you please discuss things that were reported in our weekly edition threads instead. Absolutely no discussion posts will be tolerated and your post will be reported. In the past, staff members were told to ignore the reports, but now your post will be junked. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5698512&pid=55828511#pid55828511]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[hr]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/4YCd9M9.gif[/img]
[color=1E90FF][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678]ScreemS[/url][/font][/size][spoiler=][align=left]

[hr]

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: Hello and welcome to the 360 edition of the Hack Forums News. Today we have the user ScreemS with us today. Would you like to give any shout-outs before we begin?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: Big shout out to my man Makaveli the Ape

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: First off, congrats on becoming a leader of the group Influence. Do you mind sharing how that all went down?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: Thanks so much, I joined influence when the first recruitment thread went up and I started helping out around the group bringing new ideas to the tabel. After a while Makaveli asked me if I was interested in a position as an assistant leader, which I took with pride and honor. After doing more work for the group I was added as a leader on HF.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: With groups constantly changing and new owners coming in and out, the purpose of groups change all the time. I don't mean disrespect asking this, but what would you describe Influence as? A group of members willing to assist the community of Hack Forums, a group to come together to share ideas in a private, respectable setting? What would you personally describe Influence as?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: Influence is a place for members to share their knowledge about subjects they specialise themselves in and work together to create projects that will influence the community in a positive way.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: With that being said, is there anything you would like to change about the HF community itself? If you were Omni for a day, what is one thing you would like to do to, whether it be a silly thing or something beneficial.
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: I would love to revive the VIP section for upgraded members. It used to be one big clusterfuck, but I think we can make something of it if we just behave, lol.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: That was definitely a fun time back in the days. Did you ever participate in the Upgraded Members Lounges that went on?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: Yeah I used to roam around them a lot, I am not a big lounge poster myself, but I love reading through them haha

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: When speaking to older members I like to ask, "what makes you stay commited to HF?" As people grow older, their lives change. They get jobs, they meet new people, or they just lost interest in HF. A lot of the older members I once knew are all gone. Would you say that most of your friends are still active on the website or not? Also, what keeps you motivated to stay on Hack Forums?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: Most of the members that I used to hang around with back in the days are either banned, changed, or just left the forum. My commitment to HF comes from the feeling that it gives me. HF has always been a place where I can just read hour uppon hours of threads and not get bored. Especially now that I lead Influence I am more motivated than ever.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: That's awesome to see that you are still interested in logging in everyday and participating in the community. Since joining in 2013, you've seen HF progress for the better or for the worse. What do you personally think is the correct answer? Do you believe all the work and changes Omniscient pushes out is for the better of Hack Forums, or unnecessary?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: Some of the changes that Omni made are awesome, and he is defenitely seeing the bigger picture when it comes to how the forum runs in the future. The only change that slightly bothered me was the rep kill removal, I always thought it was a way for members to be punished for what they did, but they would still be able to enjoy and read through the forum as they used to.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: Personally, I've never had any bad experiences with Omni. But that's because I never quote him or contact him unless it's needed. You see people constantly sending him messages to kiss-butt, etc. That's just not me. Anyways, I understand talking about the past can be a little tiresome. So, what I'd like to ask you is do you have any current projects you are working on? Whether it be programming an application, doing graphic design. What's ScreemS up to these days.
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: I have been very busy with Influence and making sure that it is moving in the right direction, besides that I started a new study in cinematography, so I have been focussing on VFX and Photography. I hope to open a Premiere Pro guide and helpdesk very soon :)

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: How long have you been into VFX and Photography? Would you say you spend most of your free time working on those things?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: I have been into Photography for a good 3 years now. VFX are more on the new side for me, I know my ways around Premiere Pro, but when it comes to After Effects and adding choppers and big explosions to things I still have lots to learn, lol. Most of my free time is spent working on edits for companies, or spending time playing guitar.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: Have you ever done any edits for movies or even video games? For example, I suppose a Call of Duty montage. I know it sounds cliche as hell when you think of video game editing, but something along those lines. NEW MESSAGES
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: Never done anything along the lines of video game edits, they have never bothered me that much. I mainly do wedding edits, shortfilms, or company commercials

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: Before we go, I have one last question to ask. For someone looking to get into VFX and photography, what advice would you give them when first starting out? NEW MESSAGES
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: There is always one thing I say to everyone that wants to get into those kind of things, don't buy expensive shit, just keep going, and watch fuckloads of YouTube videos. These days YouTube videos can teach you so much it's incredible.

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#98FF98][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url]: Thank you, ScreemS for taking the time out of your day/night to do this interview with me. I hope you enjoyed it. Would you like to say any final things before we end this interview?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#ffffff][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url]: It's 3:10 AM, time to go to sleep, lol. Thanks for taking the time to interview me, it was an honor.

[/align][/spoiler][/align]
 
[hr]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/DSoMap8.png[/img]

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3077324]SEND THAT BASTARD PMs! SPAM HIMMMMM TO DEATH! DO IT. JUST DO IT![/url]

[b][color=white]Weekly Reports & Breaking News[/color][/b]
Weekly Reports is now reports only - no discussions. Any discussion in Weekly Reports will be junked and continued abuse will be reported to Staff. We encourage all members to discuss the news in either the latest news edition or Breaking News thread (if applicable). So what's Breaking News? It's a new experimental idea we have for everyone. Anytime there is a major happening on HF that is pretty damn time sensitive, we'll write up a quick thread about it and will be a live rolling thread with updates either within OP or in additional posts. That's the gist of it. We won't be making these threads if Mr. Robot gets closed, he's not [i]that[/i] worthy of it. But [s]if[/s] when API V2 releases, expect a BREAKING NEWS. Me try be funny.

[b][color=white]Here's your cookie! TAKE IT[/color][/b]
Shoutout to [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131]Tsundere[/url] (if I murdered your name, I am sorry. I am not anime-friendly) for completing most of Edition 360. If possible, share your cookie with Maxim, he's the birthday boy.

[b][color=white]3600000NOSCOPPPEEEEEEEEEEEEE.mp4[/color][/b]
[yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1mz6y526yCk[/yt]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Super Sexuality Sleuthing Artificial Intelligence is on the Case[/color][/b] 
That is right; this artificial intelligence has learned to distinguish between homosexual and heterosexual male faces which were taken from an anonymous dating site with an astonishing success rate of 91 percent. Meanwhile, humans given the same task were able to pick out which faces were gay 61 percent of the time. It is also worth mentioning that the averages for distinguishing gay females are lower across the board; the AI managed 83 percent, and humans pushed out a meager 54 percent. This research may have dangerous implications for those living in parts of the world where homosexuality is illegal. This could be seen as a grim look into our future, however interesting the study actually is.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.economist.com/news/science-and-technology/21728614-machines-read-faces-are-coming-advances-ai-are-used-spot-signs]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]The More Wine Costs, the Better it Tastes?[/color][/b] 
All you wine connoisseurs on Hack Forums will want to pay close attention to this. As I'm sure many of you know in the technology space, for the most part, you get what you pay for. Associating higher quality with a better product is a phenomenon called marketing placebo. Researchers at the INSEAD Business School and the University of Bonn decided to put it to the test. Now onto their testing methodology, they showed subjects a price tag then gave them a quarter of a teaspoon of wine and had them rate it on a scale of 1 to 10. They then tested a second wine with a price tag of $14. People were more enthusiastic about what they thought was the more expensive wine across the board.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.mercurynews.com/2017/09/07/new-study-expensive-wine-tastes-better-or-does-it/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/vBnTpNT.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]What We Know So Far as Hurricane Irma Lashes Florida[/color][/b] 
Those currently in Florida or have relatives there, you are in the people's prayers. It is not any new news about Hurricane Irma, but it is still taking its course in Florida. Thankfully, the Hurricane is slowing down with a speed of 70 MPH and is now only a tropical storm, but many houses have been destroyed and trees knocked down. Over 6 million people are currently in Florida with no power and many people are currently in shelters either out of state or in the state. Flood warnings are being sent out to those who have access to service on their phone and people are being advised to continue staying indoors. Over the weekend, 10 lives were lost on the island of Cuba due to Irma. Sadly, two of the 10 that passed from the Hurricane was on a bus when they were struck by debris from a falling building above them. Islands in the Caribean have requested help from the British government. They have requested assistance in the rebuilding of their island next week after the Hurricane passes. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theguardian.com/world/2017/sep/10/what-we-know-so-far-about-hurricane-irma]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]IS Attack on Sinai Convoy 'Kills 18 Egyptian Police'[/color][/b] 
Security sources say that 18 Egyptian Police officers were killed in the Sinai peninsula, which is in the northeastern part of Egypt. The Egyptian convoy was hit in el-Arish by a roadside bomb that had destroyed three of the vehicles in the convoy. A Fourth one was also destroyed, but instead of a bomb it was supposedly tampered with by signal-jamming equipment. Those were were lucky to survive the bombings were soon faced with militants who were armed with machine guns and then layed fire on the surviving Egyptian policemen. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/world-middle-east-41230821]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/Jvg81mQ.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]The Xiaomi Mi Mix 2 is Smaller And Faster[/color][/b]
As explanations of the plan in smartphone configuration go, it's difficult to think about a more grounded one than the first Mi Mix. Calling it a "concept phone" and drawing on the abilities of unbelievable architect Philippe Starck, Xiaomi assembled a moderate chunk ruled by a gigantic screen with small bezels that foreshadowed the greatest pattern in 2017's cell phones.
Lamentably, it wasn't the most reasonable smartphone to use. Be that as it may, now, merely under a year later, Xiaomi is prepared to uncover a continuation — and on first look, the Mi Mix 2 resembles a telephone that you'd be significantly more prone to need to live with. 
The phone is all the more adjusted, really, in a break from the sharp lines utilized already. The aluminum outline encompasses a clay back board, and Xiaomi is additionally discharging an extraordinary version Mi Mix 2 that it cases will be the primary ever telephone to utilize a full unibody earthenware plan. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/9/11/16286056/xiaomi-mi-mix-2-announced-specs-features-design]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]iPhone X Price, Specifications, Features, and More[/color][/b]
iPhone X will the fundamental fascination when Apple begins its September 12 dispatch occasion in Cupertino, California. Denoting the tenth commemoration of the dispatch of the first iPhone in 2007, the new iPhone X has been in the gossip plants for long, and will be the new lead show in the organization's lineup and accompany certain highlights that even the other two models being propelled at a similar occasion - iPhone 8 and iPhone 8 Plus - won't have. From its bezel-less plan to an all better approach to open your phone, the iPhone X will bring various changes to the mobile industry with its dispatch. [i][size=x-small][url=http://gadgets.ndtv.com/mobiles/news/iphone-x-price-india-specifications-features-launch-date-time-1748871]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews/Tsundere.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]PUBG Changes[/color][/b] 
An update that the fans were waiting for is coming soon to PUBG. A new weapon will be making an introduction to the battlefield, and hopefully into your hands. The Mini-14 is a lightweight rifle .223 caliber rifle. In addition, PlayerUnknown has fixed a few bugs that may be messing with your winning streak. Well, your losing probably has nothing to do with the bugs. #Roast. If you are a fan of the rainy map, then be prepared for a new foggy weather condition that will blow your socks off. Lastly, first person leaderboards will also be finally implemented into the game. All of these little updates will be added soon sometime this month! [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/pubgs-next-update-adds-the-m14-mini-foggy-weather-fpp-leaderboards/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Blizzard Is Opening Its Own Esports Arena in LA Next Month[/color][/b] 
Esports is on the rise in popularity. From being streamed on public television to all of the events hosted by major game companies, it is no surprise that Blizzard would be interested in purchasing their very own arena. The venue is aimed at professional gamers and those who enjoy watching competitive gameplay. Inside you will find top-notch designs you typically see in any arena. Seats for fans to sit in, a control room, and high-quality audio systems. In addition, training rooms will be created in the arena for teams to practice and get ready prior to their match that day. The arena will be opening for its very first match in October where Blizzard will be hosting an Overwatch competition. A little after that, Hearthstone competition will be heading towards what Blizzard hopes to be calling their arena, Blizzard Arena. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/blizzard-is-opening-its-own-esports-arena-in-la-next-month/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Four More Free Mega Stones In Pokemon Sun And Moon Available Now[/color][/b] 
In celebration of the upcoming new Pokemon game, Nintendo is releasing four more mega stones to evolve your Pokemon! If you want to get your hands on a mega stone for Ampharos, Altaria, Latios and Latias then you are in for a treat. As always, it is the same way to receive your gift from Nintendo. However, if you do not know how to get your mega stone gift, follow these instructions here. First, you want to load up your game and head to the start menu where you see Lunala or Solgaleo depending on your version of Sun and Moon that you own. From there, you want to head over to Mystery Gift. You do not want to load your saved game! Once you click on Mystery Gift, you are one step closer. Second, you want to choose the option, "Choose to receive you gift "via code/password." Awesome! Second to last, type in this exact code, "DRACHE" when prompted to enter a code for the stones. Lastly, you want to head over to any Pokemon Center and speak to the delivery man. After speaking to him, he will gladly give you your four new mega stones! Congrats! Please note that all four of these Pokemon are not in the vanilla (original version) copy of the game and must be traded in from other games using the PokeBank feature in the Nintendo App Store. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/four-more-free-mega-stones-in-pokemon-sun-and-moon/1100-6453220/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Free Destiny 2 Items Are Up For Grabs[/color][/b] 
For a limited time, Destiny 2 is hosting mini-giveaways for their fans. However, there is a catch. Fan of energy drinks? This will be a breeze for you! Bungie has teamed up with Rockstar to provide fans with not only energy drinks to chug, but some prizes to win. If you purchase a Rockstar Energy Drink with a can that contains the promotion of the Destiny 2 game, you have the chance to win a copy of the game, PS4 system with a copy of the game, or a Husqvarna 701 Enduro Motorcycle with a Destiny 2 theme of your choice of class (Warlock, Titan, Hunter). In order to enter, as said before purchasing a can with a Destiny 2 theme to it (you will know from the Destiny 2 classes on the can design) and redeeming the code that comes with the can online. There is no limit on how many codes you can redeem. In addition, Pop-Tarts also has a bonus going on for those that purchase their products. If you buy any Pop-Tart box with the Destiny 2 theme to it, you will also receive double XP codes to use for your account. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/free-destiny-2-items-are-up-for-grabs-but-youll-ha/1100-6453145/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][sp][yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2PLXKGZJqs8[/yt][/sp][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/ctcHVCW.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Instagram: Celebrity Contact Details Leaked After Nude Bieber Photos Posted[/color][/b] 
Whether you like Bieber or not is completely up to you, but hearing something like this may either be a good thing or a bad thing. If you are a true Bieber hater, you are probably laughing at this, but if you are a Belieber then you are probably thinking many other things. Not too long ago, pop star Selena Gomez had her Instagram hacked. From that, information of other big celebrities was exposed, including nude images of her ex-boyfriend Justin Bieber. Things like emails and phone numbers of high-profile people were also obtained from this hack. Instagram states that the breach into Selena's account was due to a bug inside of the API. Since the hack, Instagram has said that the bug is now fixed and that no passwords of Instagram users were gathered. Surprisingly enough, the hacker had uploaded these nude photos of Bieber onto her feed, which if you were not familiar with her following over 125 million people had access to see Justin Bieber in the nude. After gaining access to her account, Selena had deleted the photos from her public profile. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2017/aug/31/instagram-celebrity-contact-details-leaked-nude-justin-bieber-photos-selena-gomez]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Hackers Can Silently Control Siri, Alexa & Other Voice Assistants Using Ultrasound[/color][/b] 
How interesting would it be to control voice-controlled programs and applications, such as Siri by using ultrasound? As scary as that may sound, it is also a little interesting you have to say. This new tactic can now have your iPhone open malicious links, send unwanted text messages to your friends and maybe even play weird noises out of your Amazon Alexa. Given the title of "DolphinAttack", Siri, Alexa, or any other voice assistant applications or programs are affected by this "hack" by hearing commands in an ultrasound frequency. What makes this frightening is that humans cannot hear these commands, but the AI bots microphone can pick it up like you are blasting Metallica in through your ear pods. Imagine walking through the mall, about to ask Siri where the closest Starbucks is from your current location, and your data gets hacked without your knowledge!  Other voice assistants were said, but they were never mentioned what could possibly be "hacked" by these ultrasound frequencies. A Windows PC with Cortana can even have private information compromised by this. [i][size=x-small][url=http://thehackernews.com/2017/09/ai-digital-voice-assistants.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Five Years of Jail Time Imposed on This Hacker for Harassing the Director CIA and FBI[/color][/b] 
Justin Liverman, 23, is not your ordinary young adult. What makes Liverman different than most teens in their 20's is the fact that most people around that age aren't harassing the head of the FBI and CIA. Liverman used the information he obtained on the two (John Brennan and James R. Clapper Jr.) by social engineering officials and employees of their respected companies. In addition, Liverman had used their private information to harass them and to wreak "havoc" on them. With cynical intentions, Justin had purchased a phone message bombing service to spam the phones of the victims. When Liverman was finally arrested, according to the attorney prosecuting him, he had over 20,000 victims information of those in the law enforcement database.
